about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer with over 6 years of experience building web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, and Node.js, with a focus on clean code and scalable architecture.
about.journeyText1: I started my journey as a developer over 6 years ago, and since then, I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects across different industries. My experience spans from small startups to large enterprises, giving me a well-rounded perspective on software development.
about.journeyText2: I've worked on international projects, particularly in Sweden, where I learned the importance of collaboration, communication, and delivering high-quality solutions that meet both technical and business requirements.

upwork.description: Freelance engagement via Upwork for a Spanish real estate agency managing short-term holiday rentals. Building a system to centralize property listings, manage owners/agents, and automate invoicing processes.
highlights: Building the entire solution using AWS Amplify Gen 2 and Next.js, focusing on end-to-end system development and architecture
Designing complex relational data models with join tables and JSON fields for handling multiple agent commissions per property
Developing a multi-step property registration wizard: create/select owner ‚Üí assign agents ‚Üí enter contract and cost data
Managed deeply nested form states using React Hook Form and Zustand; collaborated with Product Owner for business logic discussions

tripPlanner.description: Solo developer for a full-fledged travel booking platform focused on end-to-end system design and implementation.
highlights: Designed and developed the complete architecture for a scalable travel booking system from the ground up
Analyzed business requirements and created normalized data models using PostgreSQL; built backend services using .NET Core
Developed a responsive and SEO-optimized frontend using Next.js, delivering a seamless user experience across devices
Created native mobile apps using Kotlin (Android) and Swift (iOS) for consistent cross-platform performance
Implemented and managed CI/CD pipelines, deploying backend services via Railway and frontend apps via Vercel

sesol.description: Leading the frontend architecture and development of a modern quotation platform using React 18, Redux Toolkit, and Material UI (MUI).
highlights: Enhanced user experience by reducing quote calculation time from 5 minutes to real-time responsiveness
Migrated a legacy WordPress-based quoting system to a scalable microservices architecture using NestJS and Hexagonal Architecture
Designed, developed, and deployed a GraphQL-based application leveraging NestJS and React 18 to track and visualize real-time energy market data
Implemented Atomic Design methodology to restructure the frontend architecture, enabling scalable UI development
Collaborated with cybersecurity team to implement secure coding best practices and integrate cybersecurity measures

itjuana.description: Redesigned the UX/UI of a customer-facing healthcare application, applying accessibility best practices and intuitive design patterns.
highlights: Led to a 10% reduction in user errors and improved overall usability through better UX/UI design
Implemented multilingual support using LaunchDarkly feature flags, enabling seamless rollout of localized features
Led a cross-functional team of 2 developers and 2 QA engineers, effectively managing sprint planning and development cycles
Collaborated closely with the Product Owner to refine requirements, break down epics, and define clear user stories
Integrated OpenAI's API into services built with Go and .NET Core, developing a smart conversational bot

3pillar.description: Built a customer onboarding system featuring multi-step forms using React, Styled Components, and React Hook Form.
highlights: Delivered an intuitive and responsive user experience that streamlined customer registration
Developed a dedicated microservice for email template management and integrated AWS SNS to automate email notifications
Designed and implemented a middleware layer to manage route exposure via API Gateway
Enhanced code quality by increasing test coverage to 80% and incorporating integration testing
Contributed to the system's scalability and maintainability through strategic architectural decisions
